summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the municipal light and power system and authorizing execution of an agreement providing for the purchase of project output of the P.E.C. Headworks (O'Sullivan) hydroelectric project to be developed in connection with existing irrigation facilities from the South Columbia Basin Irrigation District, the East Columbia Basin Irrigation District and the Quincy Columbia Basin Irrigation District, for a period of forty years and making an appropriation from the Light Fund therefor.
